sentences.sentence: A rocky headland jutted into the sea.
The Therasia Resort was built on a headland.
sentences.translation: 特蕾莎度假村建在海角上。

sentences.sentence: Built in 1866 and standing on a headland overlooking the harbor, the building has been beautifully preserved.
sentences.translation: 这个建于1866年的领事馆坐落在岬角上，俯视着海港，至今仍保存完好。
